name: A. Helpful Maths
statement:
Xenia the beginner mathematician is a third year student at elementary
school. She is now learning the addition operation.The teacher has
written down the sum of multiple numbers. Pupils should calculate the
sum. To make the calculation easier, the sum only contains numbers 1, 2
and 3. Still, that isn’t enough for Xenia. She is only beginning to
count, so she can calculate a sum only if the summands follow in
non-decreasing order. For example, she can’t calculate sum 1+3+2+1 but
she can calculate sums 1+1+2 and 3+3.You’ve got the sum that was written
on the board. Rearrange the summans and print the sum in such a way that
Xenia can calculate the sum.
